meanings.sent1: The clattery old truck woke up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The clattery pots and pans in the kitchen signaled that dinner was almost ready.
meanings.sent3: The clattery washing machine seemed to have a mind of its own, dancing around the room.
meanings.sent4: The clattery engine of the airplane roared to life, ready for takeoff.
meanings.sent5: The clattery thunderstorm outside made it hard to fall asleep.

meanings.sent1: The sudden clattery of dishes falling to the floor startled everyone in the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The clattery of hooves on the cobblestone street announced the arrival of the carriage.
meanings.sent3: The clattery of the typewriter in the quiet library was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: The clattery of keys on the piano filled the concert hall with beautiful music.
meanings.sent5: The clattery of rain on the tin roof created a cozy atmosphere inside the cabin.
